name: Black Horizon (Marty)
description:
You are a space pilot of the planet Largov. Your galaxy is on the brink of destruction due to the black hole, Zyrian, becoming uncontrollably large. You are the only hope for the galaxy. Using your space ship equipped with anti-matter lasers and your survival skills, embark on a journey into deep space to destroy the black hole and save the galaxy.

Controls

  • Piloting your space ship:
  • Point the mouse cursor to aim.
  • Hold [SPACE] to thrust
  • Use the left mouse button to fire lasers

Exploring planets:

  • Use the mouse to look around.
  • Use WASD to move
  • Press [SPACE] to jump
  • Press [E] to interact or pick up items
  • Scroll with the mouse to equip items
  • Press [R] to drop items
  • Hold [SHIFT] to sprint

Created during Ludum Dare 48 by Marty Hanapole.
